accessDeniedError2.description: Message shown when the server denies access (unclear reason)
accessDeniedError2.message: El servidor ha enviat un missatge d'accés denegat. Reviseu l'adreça electrònica i la contrasenya en el diàleg d'opcions i torneu-ho a provar.

addLanguage.description: Caption of the select-element for (preferred) languages

addToDictionaryCaption.description: Title hover shown in the popup to accept a word to the internal dictionary

addonsSiteNotSupported.description: Error shown when Firefox add-on is used on https://addons.mozilla.org, which doesn't work for technical reasons
addonsSiteNotSupported.message: LanguageTool no funciona en el lloc web dels complements de Firefox (addons.mozilla.org). Funciona en qualsevol altre lloc on escrigueu (p. ex. Facebook, Gmail, Twitter, LinkedIn).

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Reviseu l'ortografia i la gramàtica dels vostres texts en qualsevol lloc web.

appDescThunderbird.description: The description of the application, displayed in the Thunderbird web store.
appDescThunderbird.message: Reviseu l'ortografia i la gramàtica en els vostres correus

appName.description: The name of the application, displayed in the web store.

appStoreDesc1.description: Description item 1 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc1.message: Troba molts errors que un simple corrector ortogràfic no pot detectar

appStoreDesc10.description: Description paragraph 1 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc10.message: Amb aquesta extensió podeu revisar el text amb el corrector gramatical i d'estil gratuït LanguageTool. LanguageTool troba molts més errors dels que troba un simple corrector ortogràfic, com ara accents diacrítics, apostrofacions, repeticions de paraules i molts altres. Funciona en més de 25 idiomes, incloent-hi català, anglès, castellà, francès, alemany i polonès.

appStoreDesc2.description: Description item 2 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)

appStoreDesc20.description: Description paragraph 2 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc20.message: LanguageTool s'ha dissenyat amb l'objectiu de la simplicitat. LanguageTool revisa l'ortografia i la gramàtica de qualsevol text seleccionat. LanguageTool és compatible amb gairebé tots els textos, independentment de la font, incloent-hi xarxes socials com Twitter o LinkedIn i serveis de correu electrònic en línia, com Gmail.

appStoreDesc3.description: Description item 3 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc3.message: Admet més de 25 idiomes (vegeu més avall)

appStoreDesc30.description: Description paragraph 3 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc30.message: L'objectiu de LanguageTool és oferir als usuaris un verificador complet de gramàtica i d'estil que els permeti tenir control i confiança sobre els continguts que generen. LanguageTool és una extensió vital per a parlants no natius de la llengua, però també reconeix molts errors comesos sovint per parlants natius. La revisió funciona amb les principals variants geogràfiques del català. LanguageTool també té un diccionari personal per a excepcions o paraules que useu sovint, però que no són en els diccionaris convencionals. LanguageTool reconeixerà aquestes paraules en les següents revisions.

appStoreDesc4.description: Description item 4 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc4.message: Funciona en gairebé en tots els llocs web, incloent-hi Gmail, Facebook i Twitter.

appStoreDesc60.description: Description paragraph 5 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc60.message: A diferència d'altres correctors, LanguageTool funciona per a moltes llengües.

appStoreDesc70.description: Description paragraph 6a in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc70.message: La vostra privacitat és important per a nosaltres. Per defecte, aquesta extensió revisa els textos enviant-los a https://languagetool.org en una connexió xifrada segura. No cal tenir un compte per a utilitzar l'extensió. No desem la vostra adreça IP. Vegeu la nostra política de privacitat en https://languagetool.org/privacy/.

appStoreDesc71.description: Description paragraph 6b in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc71.message: Envieu comentaris o reports d'errors a https://forum.languagetool.org

appStoreDesc80.description: Description paragraph 7 in Google Chrome Web Store (does not appear in the extension itself)
appStoreDesc80.message: Llista de llengües compatibles: anglès (Austràlia, Canadà, Regne Unit, Nova Zelanda, Sud-àfrica, Estats Units), francès, alemany (Àustria, Alemanya, Suïssa), asturià, bielorús, bretó, català (també valencià), xinès, danès, neerlandès, Esperanto, gallec, grec, italià, japonès, khmer, persa, polonès, portuguès (Brasil, Portugal, Angola, Moçambic), romanès, rus, eslovac, eslovè, espanyol, suec, tàmil, tàmil, ucraïnès, àrab.

attachScreenshot.description: Text shown next to a checkbox that decideds whether a screenshot should be attached to an email
attachScreenshot.message: Adjunta la captura de pantalla de la pàgina

autoCheckDesc.description: Options dialog: auto-check on all domains by default
autoCheckDesc.message: Revisió automàtica en tots els dominis per defecte

autoCheckOnDomainsDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the domains's where the check text will run automatically in background
autoCheckOnDomainsDesc.message: Revisa el text automàticament en aquests dominis:

changelog2020DiscountHeaderDescription.description: Marketing text that is sticky in header and tells users what the offer is about
changelog2020DiscountHeaderDescription.message: Porteu la vostra escriptura a un nivell superior

changelog2020DiscountHeaderDiscount.description: 20% --> Off <-- The word must come after the percentage

changelog2020DiscountHeaderHeadline.description: Marketing headline that is sticky in header and tells users what the timer is about
changelog2020DiscountHeaderHeadline.message: Descompte per temps limitat en Premium!

changelog2020DiscountHeaderLink.description: Marketing link that is sticky in header and tells users to get the discount now

changelog2020FeatureAppLink.description: Link to download the desktop app from the mac appstore
changelog2020FeatureAppLink.message: Descarregueu-la gratis en la Mac App Store

changelog2020FeaturePremiumTag.description: Label that is displayed on top of every new feature section to remind the user about the discount

changelog2020FeatureSectionAppDescriptio.description: Headline for the section that explains the desktop App in depth
changelog2020FeatureSectionAppDescriptio.message: Amb l’aplicació d’escriptori de LanguageTool per a Mac, teniu accés a tots els vostres textos en qualsevol moment. Useu la drecera de teclat del sistema i comproveu els textos del porta-retalls o dels processadors de text habituals sense perdre el format.

changelog2020FeatureSectionAppHeadline.description: Text for the section that explains the desktop App in depth (up to 200 characters)

changelog2020FeatureSectionEditorDescrip.description: Text for the section that explains the editor in depth (up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionEditorDescrip.message: L'editor LanguageTool és aquí per a oferir-vos una experiència d'escriptura lliure de distraccions. Més encara, el nostre "mode perfeccionista" us donarà molts suggeriments addicionals per a millorar els vostres texts.

changelog2020FeatureSectionEditorHeadlin.description: Headline for the section that explains the editor in depth
changelog2020FeatureSectionEditorHeadlin.message: El vostre nou editor en cap

changelog2020FeatureSectionOverleafDescr.description: Headline for the section that explains the Overleaf integration in depth
changelog2020FeatureSectionOverleafDescr.message: Useu LanguageTool en el vostre treball científic. Amb la integració en Overleaf del complement del navegador, podeu donar el toc final als vostres textos.

changelog2020FeatureSectionOverleafHeadl.description: Text for the section that explains the Overleaf integration in depth (up to 200 characters)

changelog2020FeatureSectionServicesDescr.description: Text for the section that explains that LT now supports more services than ever (up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionServicesDescr.message: LanguageTool ara ofereix més serveis que mai. Tant se val on vulgueu escriure. Ho tenim cobert.

changelog2020FeatureSectionServicesHeadl.description: Headline for the section that explains that LT now supports more services than ever

changelog2020FeatureSectionSlidesDescrip.description: Headline for the section that explains the Google Slides integration in depth
changelog2020FeatureSectionSlidesDescrip.message: LanguageTool ara funciona amb les presentacions de Google Slides. Impressioneu socis i col·legues amb una gramàtica impecable i un llenguatge atractiu.

changelog2020FeatureSectionSlidesHeadlin.description: Text for the section that explains the Google Slides integration in depth (up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionSlidesHeadlin.message: Ara també en les presentacions de Google Slide

changelog2020FeatureSectionSpanishPremiu.description: Text for the section that explains the Spanish Premium version is here in depth (up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionSpanishPremiu.message: Amb LanguageTool Premium per a espanyol, portareu la vostra escriptura a un nivell superior. Trobeu qüestions avançades i obteniu suggeriments d'estil per a millorar la vostra escriptura.

changelog2020FeatureSectionSpanishPremiu.description: Headline for the section that explains the Spanish Premium version is here in depth

changelog2020FeatureSectionStyleDescript.description: Text for the section that explains the LT style checking in depth (up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionStyleDescript.message: LanguageTool troba moltes qüestions d'estil en els vostres texts, de manera que sonareu més professional quan escriviu als col·legues.

changelog2020FeatureSectionStyleHeadline.description: Headline for the section that explains the LT style checking in depth

changelog2020FeatureSectionTeamsDescript.description: Text for the section that explains the Team Feature is here in depth (up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionTeamsDescript.message: Gestioneu el vostre equip d'escriptors i desenvolupeu un estil comú. LanguageTool Premium ara està disponible per a empreses i organitzacions.

changelog2020FeatureSectionTeamsHeadline.description: Headline for the section that explains the Team Feature is here in depth

changelog2020FeatureSectionTranslateDesc.description: Text for the section that explains the LT inline translation feature in depth (works for DE/EN only; up to 200 characters)
changelog2020FeatureSectionTranslateDesc.message: ¿Coneixeu aquella sensació de tenir una paraula anglesa a la punta de la llengua? Ara LanguageTool us ajuda a traduir paraules de l’alemany a l’anglès. Només cal que escrigueu una paraula alemanya en una frase anglesa.

changelog2020FeatureSectionTranslateHead.description: Headline for the section that explains the LT translation feature in depth
changelog2020FeatureSectionTranslateHead.message: Quina era aquella paraula altra vegada?

changelog2021FeatureSectionDesktopDescri.message: Useu les dreceres del sistema per a revisar texts en qualsevol aplicació. Amb LanguageTool per a Windows i Mac, tindreu la potència de l'editor combinada amb una integració superior amb el sistema.

changelog2021FeatureSectionFrenchDescrip.description: Headline for the section that explains the advances in the French version in depth
changelog2021FeatureSectionFrenchDescrip.message: En els darrers mesos hem doblat l'aposta pel francès. LanguageTool ara troba molts més errors i proporciona suggeriments addicionals per a millorar els vostres texts.

changelog2021FeatureSectionStyleDescript.message: Hem treballat de valent per ajudar-vos a millorar encara més els vostres texts. LanguageTool Premium ofereix ara més suggeriments d'estil que mai perquè els vostres texts destaquin.

changelog2021FeatureSectionStyleHeadline.description: Headline for the section that explains the advances in style in depth

changelog2021FeatureSectionThunderbirdDe.message: LanguageTool ara està disponible per a Thunderbird. Useu la correcció avançada d'ortografia, gramàtica i estil de LanguageTool en el vostre client de correu preferit.

changelog2021FeatureSectionWordDescripti.description: Headline for the section that explains the word upload in depth
changelog2021FeatureSectionWordDescripti.message: Tant se val si useu Windows, macOS o l'editor web, només heu d'importar el vostre document Word i beneficiar-vos de la correcció avançada d'ortografia, gramàtica i estil de LanguageTool. Exporteu el document després sense perdre el format.

extensionUpdatedHeadline.description: Shown in the dialog when the extension code was updated while the user was typing in a text field

extensionUpdatedText.description: Shown in the dialog when the extension code was updated while the user was typing in a text field.
extensionUpdatedText.message: Feu clic en la icona $iconHtml$ en la barra d'eines del vostre navegador o torneu a carregar la pàgina per a habilitar l'ortografia i la verificació gramatical de nou.

feedbackButton.description: Label for submit button of feedback form

feedbackDirectMail.message: Si voleu enviar-nos captures de pantalla, ho podeu fer amb un correu electrònic a $email$.

feedbackError.description: Error message, shown to the user when his feedback message wasn't successfully sent
feedbackError.message: No s'ha pogut enviar el missatge. Intenteu-ho més tard.

feedbackHeadline.message: Envieu els vostres comentaris a LanguageTool

feedbackSenderPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text shown in the email text field of the feedback form
feedbackSenderPlaceholder.message: Introduïu la vostra adreça de correu electrònic…

feedbackSuccess.description: Success message, shown to the user when his feedback message was successfully sent
feedbackSuccess.message: Gràcies. Intentarem respondre la vostra sol·licitud tan aviat com sigui possible.

feedbackTextPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text shown in the message text field of the feedback form

generalSettingsHeadline.description: Headline for the general section on the settings page

googleDocsDisableButton.description: menu bar button in google docs

googleDocsEnableButton.description: menu bar button in google docs

googleDocsEnableHint.description: hint pointing to a button in the google docs menu bar
googleDocsEnableHint.message: Podeu habilitar de nou aquí el corrector gramatical i d'estil LanguageTool

googleDocsNewTeaserHeadline.description: headline for a google docs teaser
googleDocsNewTeaserHeadline.message: Ha arribat LanguageTool per a Google Docs!

googleDocsNewTeaserText.description: text for a google docs teaser
googleDocsNewTeaserText.message: En el lateral de cada pàgina podeu veure quants problemes detecta LanguageTool.

googleSlidesDisableButton.description: menu bar button in google slides

googleSlidesEnableButton.description: menu bar button in google slides

googleSlidesEnableHint.description: hint pointing to a button in the google docs menu bar
googleSlidesEnableHint.message: Aquí podeu reactivar la revisió gramatical i d'estil de LanguageTool

googleSlidesNewTeaserHeadline.description: headline for a google slides teaser
googleSlidesNewTeaserHeadline.message: Ja és aquí LanguageTool per a Google Slides!

googleSlidesNewTeaserText.description: text for a google slides teaser
googleSlidesNewTeaserText.message: Al costat de cada diapositiva, ara podeu veure quants problemes ha detectat LanguageTool.

grammarError.description: Type of error (spelling error, style suggestion, grammar error, ...)

haveAccountDesc.description: Options dialog: checkbox for account access

hiddenMatchHeadline.description: headline for a suggestion that is only visible to premium users

historicPremiumErrorsButton.description: Button for new premium teaser, that shows how many grammar issues the user could have avoided with the Premium version.

historicPremiumErrorsText.description: Text for new premium teaser, that shows how many grammar issues the user could have avoided with the Premium version.
historicPremiumErrorsText.message: Podríeu haver evitat $count$ problemes de gramàtica i d’estil en els darrers dies amb LanguageTool Premium.

historicPremiumErrorsText2.description: Text for new premium teaser, that shows how many grammar issues the user could have avoided with the Premium version. Important: The count needs to be at the beginning of the sentence!
historicPremiumErrorsText2.message: $count$ problemes de gramàtica i d’estil podrien haver-se evitat en els darrers dies amb LanguageTool Premium.

ignoreDomainsCheckDesc.description: Options dialog: text for the textarea with the domains's where the check text won't run automatically in background
ignoreDomainsCheckDesc.message: No facis revisió automàtica en aquests dominis:

ignoreHere.description: Button that allows to ignore a misspelled word or grammar error in the current text field.

ignoredRules.description: Text shown at the bottom of the popup to turn on turned off rules again
ignoredRules.message: Aquestes regles s'han desactivat. Feu clic en una regla per a activar-la de nou:

ignoredRulesDesc.description: Shown as title of ignored rules block on options page

incompleteResult.description: Message shown in dialog when validation return incomplete result
incompleteResult.message: Els resultats són incomplets: la revisió del text s'ha aturat perquè hi ha massa errors.

invalidUsernameOrPassword.description: Message shown when user uses their languagetoolplus.com account but could not be authenticated
invalidUsernameOrPassword.message: Error: Comproveu l'adreça electrònica i la contrasenya en el diàleg d'opcions

language.description: Text shown in the popup to indicate the automatically detected language of the text checked

languageOptionsLink.description: Language options containing e.g. the mother tongue, the preferred languages, the variants, etc.

languagetoolNotSupported.description: Languagetool.org is test example, so we show this error
languagetoolNotSupported.message: L'extensió no funciona en aquest lloc web, perquè el lloc web ofereix la mateixa funcionalitat.

localServer.description: Radio button label for the local server setting, the one that needs manual set-up
localServer.message: Servidor local (localhost): requereix un servidor de LanguageTool que s'executi localment

localServerDocs.description: Link to documentation for installing the server locally

managedLoginButton1.description: Button label for logging in with an account

managedLoginButton2.description: Button label for logging in with an account
managedLoginButton2.message: Inicieu la sessió amb el vostre compte corporatiu

managedLoginDescription.description: Description for enterprise users who can log in with the account of their employer
managedLoginDescription.message: Inicieu la sessió amb el vostre compte corporatiu per a utilitzar LanguageTool.

managedLoginHeadline.description: Headline for enterprise users who can log in with the account of their employer

messagePopupTurnOnPrimaryButton.description: Button to close message box; Shown after checking was disabled

messagePopupTurnOnSecondaryButton.description: Button to enable checking on page; Shown after checking was disabled

messagePopupTurnOnheadline.description: Instruction headline to enable checking on page; Shown after checking was disabled
messagePopupTurnOnheadline.message: La verificació ortogràfica és desactivada per a aquesta pàgina

messagePopupTurnOntext.description: Instruction text to enable checking on page; Shown after checking was disabled
messagePopupTurnOntext.message: Per a reactivar-la, feu clic en la icona de LT en la vostra barra d'eines i en el botó 'Revisa ortografia i gramàtica'.

moreDetails.description: Link shown to get more details about the error somewhere on the web (not shown for every error)

motherTongueDesc.description: Options dialog: text next to the 'mother tongue' selection

motherTongueExpl.description: Options dialog: more descriptive text explaining what selection of mother tongue does
motherTongueExpl.message: Establiu idioma matern si voleu que us advertim sobre falsos amics quan reviseu texts no escrits en el vostre idioma matern.

msOnlineOfficeNotSupported.description: Error shown when clicking the toolbar icon at Microsoft Word Online
msOnlineOfficeNotSupported.message: Microsoft Word Online no és compatible amb aquesta extensió: només cal que instal·leu aquesta extensió.

noErrorsFound2.description: Shown in popup when no errors have been found
noErrorsFound2.message: Bé! No s'ha trobat cap error!

noErrorsFoundText.description: Shown in popup when no errors have been found as a subheadline

onboardLanguageSelectorCta.description: Button text in the onboarding's preferred language selector section

onboardLanguageSelectorDescription.description: Decription of the onboarding's preferred language selector section
onboardLanguageSelectorDescription.message: Per a oferir els suggeriments més adequats, ens cal saber quins idiomes soleu usar.

onboardLanguageSelectorHeading.description: Headline of the onboarding's preferred language selector section
onboardLanguageSelectorHeading.message: Trieu els idiomes en què soleu escriure

onboardingHeadline.description: Text shown to the user when he accepted the privacy policy and is now ready to use the add-on

onboardingIntro.description: Text shown to the user when he accepted the privacy policy and is now ready to use the add-on
onboardingIntro.message: Els vostres texts es revisaran en la majoria de camps de text mentre escriviu.

onboardingIntroThunderbird.description: Text shown to a thunderbird user when he accepted the privacy policy and is now ready to use the add-on
onboardingIntroThunderbird.message: El text es revisarà mentre redacteu els correus.

onboardingNote1.description: Installation note. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote1.message: Torneu a carregar totes les pàgines web obertes per a activar l'extensió

onboardingNote2.description: Installation note. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote2.message: Aquesta extensió no funciona amb camps de text en Chrome Web Store o en addons.mozilla.org

onboardingNote3.description: Installation note. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote3.message: Per a desactivar l'extensió en un lloc web, feu clic en la icona LT de la barra d'eines del navegador

onboardingNote4.description: Installation note that describes how to use synonyms. Shown once the user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNote4.message: Es poden demanar sinònims fent doble clic sobre una paraula en un camp de text (p. ex. Gmail, Facebook o Google Docs).

onboardingNoteThunderbird1.description: Installation note. Shown once the thunderbird user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNoteThunderbird1.message: Comenceu un missatge nou per a activar l'extensió.

onboardingNoteThunderbird2.description: Installation note. Shown once the thunderbird user has accepted the privacy policy.
onboardingNoteThunderbird2.message: Per a desactivar l'extensió, feu clic en la icona de LT dalt a la dreta de la finestra de redacció de correus.

otherServer.description: Radio button label for the server URL if neither cloud nor local server is the correct choice
otherServer.message: un altre servidor: requereix un servidor LanguageTool en execució

overleafNewTeaserHeadline.message: Ja és aquí LanguageTool per a Overleaf!

overleafNewTeaserText.message: Desplaceu-vos pel text per a veure suggeriments d'ortografia, gramàtica i estil.

popupGeneralSettingsHeadline.description: Headline for general settings shown in the addon popup

popupGlobalSettingsHeadline.description: Headline for the global settings shown in the addon popup

popupGlobalSettingsHeadlineInfo.description: Adds more context regarding the scope to the headline for the global settings shown in the addon popup

popupOnboardingHeadline.description: Title shown on top of a list explaining how to use the LanguageTool addon

popupOnboardingStep1.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep1.message: Feu clic en qualsevol camp de text de múltiples línies (p. ex. en Gmail, Facebook…).

popupOnboardingStep2.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep2.message: Trobareu una icona com $icon1Html$ o $icon2Html$ a l'extrem inferior dret.

popupOnboardingStep3.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep3.message: Escriviu un text. Els problemes d'escriptura seran <u>subratllats</u>.

popupOnboardingStep4.description: List item explaining step by step how to use the LanguageTool addon
popupOnboardingStep4.message: Feu clic en una paraula subratllada per a obtenir suggeriments.

popupOpenEditorButton.description: Button that opens the LanguageTool Editor

popupOptionPickyMode.description: Label for enabling/disabling picky mode functionality globally (displayed next to a checkbox)

popupOptionPickyModeDescription.description: Description label for enabling/disabling picky mode functionality globally (displayed next to a checkbox)
popupOptionPickyModeDescription.message: Per a un estil i una tipografia perfectes.

popupOptionSynonyms.description: Label for enabling/disabling synonym functionality (displayed next to a checkbox)

popupOptionSynonymsDescription.description: Description label for enabling/disabling synonym functionality (displayed next to a checkbox)
popupOptionSynonymsDescription.message: Feu doble clic en qualsevol paraula en un camp de text per a veure sinònims.

popupOptionValidateInEditor.message: Revisa el text seleccionat en l'editor

popupPremiumText.message: Actualitzeu a LanguageTool Premium per a trobar errors no sols de gramàtica i puntuació sinó també d'estil.

popupSettingsHeadline.description: Headline for the website specific settings shown in the addon popup

popupSettingsHeadlineInfo.description: Adds more context regarding the scope to the headline for the website specific settings shown in the addon popup

popupSettingsHover.description: Mouse hover over the settings icon

poweredBy.description: Hint that explains who the author of this add-on is

premiumErrorsButton.description: Button shown in premium teaser that sends the user to the pricing table. Button text should be as short as possible

premiumErrorsTextPlural.description: Hint shown in a premium teaser, telling the user that there are more issues that only the premium version found
premiumErrorsTextPlural.message: El vostre text conté $count$ problemes d’escriptura avançats

premiumErrorsTextSingular.description: Hint shown in a premium teaser, telling the user that there are more issues that only the premium version found
premiumErrorsTextSingular.message: El vostre text conté un problema d’escriptura avançat

privacyLinkForDefaultServer.message: Per a més informació, consulteu la nostra política de privacitat.

privacyListSwitchable.description: Privacy list item. Shown as additional information to privacy note.
privacyListSwitchable.message: La comprovació es potdesactivar en qualsevol moment

privacyListUnsaved.description: Privacy list item. Shown as additional information to privacy note.

privacyNoteForDefaultServer.description: Shown on first start of extension to make user aware of privacy issues when using the default server on languagetool.org
privacyNoteForDefaultServer.message: Aquesta extensió comprovarà el text enviant-lo a $serverHost$ amb una connexió xifrada. El vostre text no s’emmagatzemarà.

privacyNoteForOtherServer.description: Shown on first start of extension to make user aware of privacy issues when using some other than the default server
privacyNoteForOtherServer.message: Aquesta extensió revisarà el vostre text enviant-lo a $serverUrl$. Per a tornar al servidor per defecte, visiteu la pàgina d'opcions de l'extensió.

privacyNoteSlogan.description: Slogan after 'LanguageTool' shown in privacy dialog at first start

privacyPolicy.description: Options dialog: Link to privacy policy

punctuationError.description: Type of error (spelling error, style suggestion, grammar error, ...)

ratingHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to rate the add-on

ratingText.description: Text shown in the teaser that asks user to rate the add-on

ratingThankYou.description: Message shown to the user after he rated

ratingUnhappyQuestion.description: If user gives a negative rating, we ask the user why he's unhappy
ratingUnhappyQuestion.message: Expliqueu-nos per què no esteu satisfet.

removeExtraWhitespace.description: Button to remove consecutive white space

reportAnIssue.description: Link text for sending feedback to languagetool.org

reviewChromeHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Chrome Store
reviewChromeHeadline.message: Ens faríeu una valoració en la botiga de Chrome?

reviewEdgeHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Edge Add-On Store
reviewEdgeHeadline.message: Ens donareu una qualificació a la botiga de complements d'Edge?

reviewFirefoxHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Firefox Add-On Store
reviewFirefoxHeadline.message: Ens faríeu una valoració en la botiga de Firefox?

reviewOperaHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Opera Add-On Store
reviewOperaHeadline.message: Ens faríeu una valoració en la botiga de complements d'Opera?

reviewSafariHeadline.description: Headline shown in the teaser that asks user to give a review in the Apple App Store
reviewSafariHeadline.message: Ens donaríeu una qualificació a l'App Store?

sendFeedback.description: Link text for sending feedback to languagetool.org

serverNotAvailable.description: Warning shown to the user that the local server isn't available
serverNotAvailable.message: El servidor local no està disponible

serverText.description: Options dialog: description of the text field for the API server URL
serverText.message: URL de l'API del servidor de LanguageTool:

serverUrlIsInvalid.description: Options dialog: error shown if server URL is not valid, e.g. doesn't start with http or https

settingsAccountBulletListEditor.description: Advantage of account login in the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountBulletListEditor.message: Useu l'editor com a entorn d'escriptura lliure de distraccions.

settingsAccountBulletListSave.description: Advantage of account login in the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountBulletListSave.message: Deseu els textos per a més tard.

settingsAccountBulletListSync.description: Advantage of account login in the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountBulletListSync.message: Sincronitzeu la configuració i el diccionari personal en diferents navegadors i dispositius.

settingsAccountDescription.description: Description for the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountDescription.message: Inicieu la sessió i obteniu aquests avantatges:

settingsAccountHeadline.description: Headline for the account login section on the settings page

settingsAccountSubheadline.description: Subheadline for the account login section on the settings page
settingsAccountSubheadline.message: Inicieu la sessió amb el vostre compte de LanguageTool

settingsAddAutoCheckDomainHint.description: Text shown when the entered domain doesn't exist yet in the list of autocheck domains
settingsAddAutoCheckDomainHint.message: El domini encara no s'ha afegit. Premeu Retorn per a afegir-lo.

settingsAddDomainHint.description: Text shown when the entered domain doesn't exist yet in the list of ignored domains
settingsAddDomainHint.message: El domini encara no s’ha afegit. Premeu RETORN per a afegir-lo.

settingsAddIgnoredDomainHint.description: Text shown when the entered domain doesn't exist yet in the list of ignored domains
settingsAddIgnoredDomainHint.message: El domini encara no s'ha afegit. Premeu Retorn per a afegir-lo.

settingsAddOrFilterAutoCheckDomains.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter web domains where the addon should autocheck texts

settingsAddOrFilterDomains.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter web domains where the addon shouldn't run on

settingsAddOrFilterIgnoredDomains.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter web domains where the addon shouldn't autocheck texts

settingsAddOrFilterWords.description: Placeholder text for input field where user can enter new words for his dictionary (he can use the input field also for searching in his dictionary)

settingsAddWordHint.description: Text shown when the entered word doesn't exist yet in the personal dictionary
settingsAddWordHint.message: Aquesta paraula encara no existeix en el diccionari. Premeu RETORN per a afegir-la.

settingsAreYouSure.description: Confirmation message for when the user wants to clear or delete something.
settingsAreYouSure.message: Esteu segur? No es podrà desfer.

settingsClearAll.description: Button text that deletes all items in a list

settingsCopyDictionary.description: Button text that copy all words from personal dictionary to clipboard

settingsCopyDictionarySuccessful.description: Message shown when dictionary copied to clipboard successful.

settingsDeleteAutoCheckDomain.description: Button for removing a domain from the list of autocheck domains

settingsDeleteIgnoredDomain.description: Button for removing a domain from the list of ignored domains

settingsDictionaryHeadline.description: Headline for the personal dictionary section on the settings page

settingsDomainInvalid.description: Error message shown when the domain the user entered is not valid or is already in the list
settingsDomainInvalid.message: Introduïu un domini vàlid que encara no s'hagi afegit.

settingsEmptyAutoCheckDomains.description: Text shown when autocheck domains list doesn't contain any domains (yet)
settingsEmptyAutoCheckDomains.message: Encara no heu activat la revisió automàtica en cap lloc web

settingsEmptyDictionary.description: Text shown when personal dictionary doesn't contain any words (yet)

settingsEmptyDomainList.description: Text shown when disabled-domain list doesn't contain any domains (yet)
settingsEmptyDomainList.message: Encara no heu desactivat cap domini

settingsEmptyIgnoredDomains.description: Text shown when ignored domains list doesn't contain any domains (yet)
settingsEmptyIgnoredDomains.message: Encara no heu desactivat la revisió automàtica en cap lloc web

settingsEmptyIgnoredRules.description: Text shown when there are no ignored rules (yet)
settingsEmptyIgnoredRules.message: Encara no heu desactivat cap regla. Podeu desactivar regles quan apareguin en un text.

settingsEnableAllRules.description: Button text that enables all grammar rules that were previously disabled

settingsEnableDomain.description: Button for removing a domain from the list of disabled-domains

settingsExperimentalSuccess.description: Success message shown when the user saves the experimental settings

settingsForgotPasswordLink.description: Placeholder text for password text field

settingsLanguageVariantsDescription.description: Description of the language variants section in the options panel
settingsLanguageVariantsDescription.message: Per a oferir-vos els suggeriments més adequats, digueu-nos quina varietat de l'idioma useu.

settingsLanguageVariantsHeadline.description: Headline of the language variants section in the options panel

settingsLoggedInAs.description: Text shown for users who have logged in with their LanguageTool account
settingsLoggedInAs.message: Heu iniciat la sessió com a $email$.

settingsLoginButton.description: Button for logging in with email and password

settingsLoginError.description: Error message shown when the user credentials (email and password) are wrong
settingsLoginError.message: No s'ha pogut iniciar la sessió. Comproveu l'adreça electrònica i la contrasenya.

settingsLoginSuccess.description: Success message shown when the user logged in

settingsLogoutSuccess.description: Success message shown when the user logged out

settingsManageAccountButton.description: Button for going to the account section

settingsPasswordPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for password text field

settingsPreferredLanguagesCompleteList.description: Caption of the sub-list of all available languages in the preferred languages dropdown

settingsPreferredLanguagesDescription.description: Description of the preferred languages section in the options panel
settingsPreferredLanguagesDescription.message: Establiu els idiomes en què soleu escriure. Això ajuda LanguageTool a detectar automàticament l'idioma correcte.

settingsPreferredLanguagesHeadline.description: Headline of the preferred languages section in the options panel

settingsPreferredLanguagesPopularList.description: Caption of the sub-list of popular languages in the preferred languages dropdown

settingsPremiumButton.description: Button text for a teaser on the settings page promoting the premium functionality

settingsPremiumFeaturesActivated.description: Text shown for users who have logged in with their LanguageTool account and who have a paid subscription

settingsPremiumHeadline.description: Headline for a teaser on the settings page promoting the premium functionality

settingsPremiumText.description: Text for a teaser on the settings page promoting the premium functionality
settingsPremiumText.message: Trobeu problemes de gramàtica, d'estil i puntuació avançats o reviseu texts de fins a 100.000 caràcters.

settingsServerUrlDisabled.description: Explains why the custom server URL can't be changed when logged in.
settingsServerUrlDisabled.message: Només podreu establir un URL de servidor personalitzat quan tanqueu la sessió del vostre compte de LanguageTool.

siteCannotBeSupported.description: Some sites are too complex and can probably never be supported, so we show this error
siteCannotBeSupported.message: Aquest lloc web utilitza una tecnologia per a l'edició de text que no és compatible. Poseu-vos en contacte amb els propietaris del lloc i demaneu-los que integrin el LanguageTool.

spellingError.description: Type of error (spelling error, style suggestion, grammar error, ...)

statusIconEnableLT.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in disabled state
statusIconEnableLT.message: Habiliteu LanguageTool: revisió ortogràfica i gramatical

statusIconError.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in error state

statusIconMoreErrors.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in incomplete result state
statusIconMoreErrors.message: Els resultats són incomplets: la comprovació del text s'ha aturat a causa d'haver-hi massa errors.

statusIconPermissionRequired.description: Shown when hover over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in permission required state (i.e. user has not confirmed privacy dialog on first start)
statusIconPermissionRequired.message: No es pot revisar el text: confirmeu la política de privacitat primer.

statusIconReload.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one) in reload needed state
statusIconReload.message: L'extensió s'ha actualitzat. Torneu a carregar la pàgina per a habilitar la revisió ortogràfica i gramatical.

statusIconToolTip.description: Shown when hovering over the status icon (not the toolbar one)

suggestionError.description: Type of error (spelling error, style suggestion, grammar error, ...)

suggestionOnlyVisibleToPremiumButton.description: Button that tells the user he has to upragde to see all suggestions
suggestionOnlyVisibleToPremiumButton.message: Obteniu tots els avantatges de Premium

suggestionOnlyVisibleToPremiumText.description: Hint that tells the user that the current mistake that they are seeing is only available for Premium users
suggestionOnlyVisibleToPremiumText.message: Això és un suggeriment avançat que sols està disponible en la versió Premium de LanguageTool. Actualitzeu a Premium per a obtenir suggeriments com aquest i molts més.

switchToNewZealandEnglish.message: Canvia a anglès de Nova Zelanda

synonymsCardGeneralError.description: Generic error message shown when there was an issue getting a synonym from the server
synonymsCardGeneralError.message: Hi ha hagut un error carregant els sinònims

synonymsCardHeadline.description: Headline for the box that offers thesaurus synonyms

synonymsCardLanguageNotSupported.description: Message shown when synonyms are not supported for the current text language
synonymsCardLanguageNotSupported.message: Encara no hi ha servei per als sinònims d'aquesta llengua.

synonymsCardLoading.description: Text shown when synonyms are still being loaded from the server

synonymsCardNoSynonymsAvailable.description: Message shown when there are no synonyms for the given word
synonymsCardNoSynonymsAvailable.message: No hi ha sinònims disponibles per a aquesta paraula

synonymsCardTooltipReadText.description: Tool tip for text to speach button, reads out loud a word or text

synonymsTutorialHeadline.description: Headline for a small box that explains how the new synonym feature works

synonymsTutorialText.description: Text in a small box that explains how the new synonym feature works
synonymsTutorialText.message: Obteniu els sinònims de qualsevol paraula fent-hi doble clic. Funciona en tots els camps de text compatibles amb LanguageTool.

textTooLong.description: Message shown to the user when his text is too large to be checked
textTooLong.message: Aquest text és massa llarg per a ser revisat.

timeoutError.description: Error message shown if API server doesn't respond timely
timeoutError.message: Temps d'espera esgotat. Proveu-ho més tard ($serverUrl$).

tooManyErrors.description: Message shown to the user when his text contains too many errors
tooManyErrors.message: Fa l'efecte que aquest text conté massa errors. ¿Esteu segur que heu seleccionat l'idioma correcte?

tooManyRequests.description: Message shown to the user when they have sent too many and/or large requests
tooManyRequests.message: S'ha superat el límit de sol·licituds. Espereu un minut i LanguageTool estarà disponible de nou.

tryAgain.description: Link the user can click on when they got a warning that the local server isn't available

turnOffPickyMode.description: Button that allows to turn off picky mode in the current text field.
turnOffPickyMode.message: Desactiva el mode perfeccionista en aquest text

turnOffRule.description: Link shown in the popup to turn off, i.e. ignore, a rule (the rule - not just this match)
turnOffRule.message: Desactiva la regla a tot arreu

turnOffRulePicky.description: Link shown in the popup to turn off, i.e. ignoring a rule is not allowed
turnOffRulePicky.message: Els suggeriments gramaticals no es poden desactivar en el mode perfeccionista.

turnOnHint.message: Podeu tornar a activar l'extensió aquí

unknownError.description: Message shown to the user when his text is too large to be checked
unknownError.message: S'ha produït un error en revisar el text. Una manera de resoldre el problema és reinicialitzar el navegador.

upgradeTeaserDiscountHeadline.description: Headline for the discount teaser that should raise urgency

username.description: Options dialog: user name for languagetoolplus.com

validatorHasMistakesHeadlinePlural.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text contains spelling, punctuation or grammar errors

validatorHasMistakesHeadlineSingular.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text contains spelling, punctuation or grammar errors

validatorHasMistakesText.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text contains spelling, punctuation or grammar errors
validatorHasMistakesText.message: Feu clic en les paraules ressaltades per a corregir-les.

validatorHasPremiumErrorsButton.description: Button that sends the user to the upgrade/pricing page

validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlinePlural.description: Text shown when the text contains writing issues that are only found in the premium version
validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlinePlural.message: El text conté $count$ problemes de redacció avançats

validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlineSingula.description: Text shown when the text contains writing issues that are only found in the premium version
validatorHasPremiumErrorsHeadlineSingula.message: El text conté un problema de redacció avançat

validatorHasPremiumErrorsText.description: Text shown when the text contains writing issues that are only found in the premium version
validatorHasPremiumErrorsText.message: Actualitzeu a LanguageTool Premium per a trobar molts més errors de gramàtica, estil i puntuació.

validatorLoadingHint.description: Loading status, shown when text is currently being checked

validatorNoMistakesHeadline.description: Text displayed on top of text when the text doesn't contain any errors
validatorNoMistakesHeadline.message: Enhorabona, no s'ha trobat cap error!

validatorNoTextStatus.description: Text shown above validator text field when it doesn't have enough characters to be checked
validatorNoTextStatus.message: Escriviu o enganxeu el text per a revisar-lo

validatorPlaceholder.description: Text shown in text field when it's empty
validatorPlaceholder.message: Introduïu o enganxeu el text aquí…

validatorPremiumButton.description: Label for a button. Clicking it will send the user to the website where he can buy the premium version

validatorPremiumHeadline.description: Title for a bullet point list of features the premium version has
validatorPremiumHeadline.message: Trobeu més problemes d'escriptura i esdevindreu un escriptor més bo.

validatorPremiumReason1.description: Reason for buying the premium version
validatorPremiumReason1.message: Una revisió més completa de gramàtica, puntuació i estil

validatorPremiumReason2.description: Reason for buying the premium version
validatorPremiumReason2.message: Reviseu texts més llargs (de fins a 100.000 caràcters)

validatorPremiumReason3.description: Reason for buying the premium version
validatorPremiumReason3.message: Detecció automàtica de nombres invàlids (p. ex. IBAN, ISBN…)

validatorPremiumReason4.description: Reason for buying the premium version

validatorTextTooLongStatus.description: Text shown above validator text field when text is too long for validation
validatorTextTooLongStatus.message: Aquest text és massa llarg per a ser revisat.

variantCaDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantDeDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantEnDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

variantPtDesc.description: Options dialog: set the language variant

webstoreSiteNotSupported.description: Error shown when Chrome extension is used on https://chrome.google.com/webstore, which doesn't work for technical reasons
webstoreSiteNotSupported.message: Google Chrome impedeix a les extensions accedir a Chrome Web Store. Funciona en qualsevol altre lloc on escrigueu (p. ex. Facebook, Gmail, Twitter, LinkedIn).
